componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Three ways to use our resources!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Educators and students can access our textbook and resources wherever they want, whenever they want, free of charge! But did you know that Writing Guide with Handbook offers a unique set of supplemental instructor resources for your rhetoric course? See below for some inspiration!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: In the past, instructors have gotten creative with using our resources. For example, instructors have...

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Used our discussion questions to create homework assignments and study guides

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Utilized key concepts and discussion points from our PowerPoint slides to ignite engaging class discussions

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Visited the OER Commons Hub to share the resources they’ve created and find resources created by other instructor

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Accessing these instructor resources is easy — simply take one minute to create your free instructor account and begin exploring!
